name: Ace Infotech
tagline: Provides IT consulting, software dev't & Testing
description:
ACE InfoTech, founded in 2005, is a tech savvy company with the power of software and the direction and flow of a dot-com. In addition, ACE InfoTech is people friendly; not just technology oriented. We understand that most of our customers are neither familiar with technology, nor have the time and resources to devote to their technical needs. This is where we step in to lend a helping hand.
ACE InfoTech shields you from the technology aspect of your business so that you can concentrate on what matters; your business.
READ MORE...
